scripts.docker:build: echo 'Docker cannnot copy files from a parent directory so we need to put the current dev version of express-mustache-overlays in this directory and change package.json'; mkdir -p express-mustache-overlays ; rsync --delete --exclude='example' --exclude='*.DS_Store' --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' -aHxv ../ express-mustache-overlays/ ; cat package.json | sed -e 's|file:..|file:express-mustache-overlays|g' > package.json.docker ; docker build . -t thejimmyg/express-mustache-overlays:0.5.0
